title: bumbumchang
author: bumbumchang
created_time: May 30, 2023, 05:49:25 PMLast edit: May 30, 2023, 06:49:14 PM by bumbumchang
content: Hello everyone,my name is Ryan and I'm about to launch a Crypto AI-assisted trading platform combined with MLM-systems (Friends recruit friends) in the next 2 months.Through this concept, people can earn money by trading on the platform and profit on promotion to friends.The platform will be developed and programmed by me and a friend. The project start will be - as already mentioned - in about 2 months.Now we are looking for team members in the area of Crypto Twitter Marketing (Crypto CMO).I would like to do this directly in advance to ensure a launch with a full team.You should have some experience in marketing, more important are contacts in the Crypto area (Reach Discord/Telegram Shilling Groups). Optimally, you already have a reputable Twitter account with some followers at hand that is trustworthy and credible.Through aggressive marketing campaigns and your marketing technical skills, we will quickly attract customers (especially in this Space). Words like Shilling and Shitcoin marketing should not be foreign words for you, because especially in this area a lot of Memecoin traders and crypto investors can be found and they are the main customers.So in few words we need:- A marketer with deep and excellent knowledge in the crypto space (memecoins, shitcoins, metaverse/ai ; also very good: knowledge in solidity/smart contract development)- Good contacts in cryptospace + reach to crypto people through your Twitter acc- Strong experience in Twitter/Discord/Telegram Crypto Marketing- Constantly pushing tweets and social media news in every kind of relevant crypto network (Twitter, Telegram, Discord, Reddit etc.)What we offer:- Long-term partnership, also for other projects- Good salary with benefits for simple shilling and promoting the projectAs we want to run this and future projects on a long-term basis, we are of course eager to establish long-term, serious and constant working relationships. Therefore, we ask you to send only serious contact requests.We are looking forward to your feedback with a detailed description of yourself and your experience.Feel free to send a private message on bitcointalk!

comments.author: nioctib_100
comments.body: Would you be willing to post a rough range for what you'd be willing to pay for salary or elaborate a little more on that if it's based on commissions as most MLM systems are?

comments.author: bumbumchang
comments.body: Quote from: nioctib_100 on May 31, 2023, 02:29:49 AMWould you be willing to post a rough range for what you'd be willing to pay for salary or elaborate a little more on that if it's based on commissions as most MLM systems are? Hello,thanks for your reply and interest in this project.What experiences and skills do you bring to the table? Are you able to work active and daily on the project and advertise it? Have you got strong crypto connections or a big reach to the crypto people on Twitter/Discord/Telegram/Reddit? All that are important questions, which the salary depends on.As I am interested in long-term parnterships, the salary can be generous!Feel free to send a PM on bitcointalk, we can discuss furthermore there.Regards

comments.author: Kakmakr
comments.body: You are taking on a giant task to change people's perception on AI assisted Crypto trading platforms and tools. There are so many scams doing the rounds with supposed AI algorithms being used to trade successfully, with many people who have burnt their fingers and telling everyone about their bad experience. A friend of mine are part of a large forex trading community and they are actively warning people against these scams. You will have to get solid proof that the AI that you are using are legit and that it will work for other people. Good luck with you project..... but it's a hot potato scene for me.... and I think you have a huge task in front of you.

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: It's an MLM system. Everyone on Bitcointalk knows how Multi-level marketing works:- You start a business to sell "products"- Recruit some people, so that you can get a commission from their sales (and everyone they recruit)- Have those people recruit MORE people, so that you can get even more commission from their sales (and everyone they recruit)etc...At the end of the day, only those at the top earn money, everyone else ends up losing some amount of money.I don't think you will find anyone here to promote your scheme.
